replies.body: where? he said bro, but didnt hear hue.
I swear he said something in a different language.

but there is no chinese word for bro, and he isn't going to say 哥哥 or 弟弟 now is he.

he says bro(elongated)
I never said anything about chinese, and plus the word he said went up and down in pitch. I'm pretty sure it wasn't just bro.

After Trundle says Kandewanga bradaduida Olaf says hue (right after he dodges Ezreal ult). I think it's kablooie though or something on listening to it again. Sounds like hue though. It's a hue moment.
